name: TRUCK BED MOLLE MOUNT OPTIONS
description:
MOLLE organizer designed specifically for Trucks, Truck beds, SUV Interiors, and Automotive Trunks.

Modular no-drill design can be installed using Flat Straps, 550 Cord, Webbing, Carabineers, Velcro, Snap Hooks, Bed Rail Clamps, and Bolts.

Removable bed-roll design allows for mixed mode automotive bugging out in seconds with gear.

1000D Cordura with Mil Spec MOLLE on front, Velcro on back, and four sets of hidden Grommet mount points.

Low cost basic multi-use 48" x 6" size designed by Law Enforcement & Military professionals for all applications.

Meets or Exceeds SHTF Consulting testing standards for Domestic Disaster Prepping Level 2 (DDP-2).

Available in custom sizes and colors to include Black, Coyote Brown, Ranger Green, and Zombie Green.

Email shtforders@gmail.com for custom sizes and colors.

name: JEEP MOLLE RACK
description:
In the testing phase but hang on to your shoes 4 Wheelers because this thing is going to blow your mind! 

I hope you own a Jeep because this was designed by a fan for his Jeep.

name: MOLLE WALLY
description:
Moveable tactical organizer is both vertical & horizontal capable.

Half the cost of traditional single direction / function MOLLE & PALS units.

Self-locking bed-roll allows for bugging out in seconds with all your gear.

Basic 16” x 50” multi-use size fits all gun safes & standard doors for modular installation.

Reversible hook & loop sizes allow for easy installation in gun safes & allow for adding patches.

Exclusively used in Safe & Hard Room applications built & designed by SHTF Consulting.

Designed by Law Enforcement & Military professionals for diverse applications & conditions.

Meets or Exceeds SHTF Consulting testing standards for Domestic Disaster Prepping Level 2 (DDP-2).

200 LBS/FT Tensile Strength with a UV resistant construction for Multi-Mount functionality.

Email shtforders@gmail.com for custom sizes.
